snippet.title: Carth - Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Carth is an intense multiplayer survival game with heavy RPG elements. Survive against other players and a growing evil spread across the huge open world. Craft, Build, and work together or go at it alone. Only you can decide how you will survive in Carth. 

Carth is a great upcoming indie game set to release Mid 2023. 
You can play the demo starting Monday February 6th during Steam Next Fest. 
~Wishlist Carth Today~
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1526430/Carth/
